ckPrim Class Reference
[ckDraw -- Graphics module]

A drawing element primitive, which has several drawing ways. More...

#include <ck_prim.h>

Detailed Description

A drawing element primitive, which has several drawing ways.

void ckPrim::setDataRect ( u16  index,
const ckVec &  center,
r32  width,
r32  height,
ckCol  col,
r32  u1,
r32  v1,
r32  u2,
r32  v2 
)

Sets the primitive data as a rectange.

The prim mode must be MODE_TRIANGLE_FAN.

Parameters:
[in] index The first index of a primitive data.
[in] center The center of a rectangle.
[in] width The width of a rectangle.
[in] height The height of a rectangle.
[in] col The color of a rectangle.
[in] u1 The u value of the left-top vertex of a rectangle.
[in] v1 The v value of the left-top vertex of a rectangle.
[in] u2 The u value of the right-bottom vertex of a rectangle.
[in] v2 The v value of the right-bottom vertex of a rectangle.
